duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a comprehensive people strategy that drives business performance and enhances employee experience.
Lead and advise on talent, performance, and team effectiveness to drive organizational results.
Set long-range plans to ensure business has needed talent, structure, engagement, and capabilities.
Establish OKRs for the function and up-level operational excellence and efficiency.
Effectively communicate with and gain buy-in from a broad range of stakeholders.
Translate business needs into a strategic people plan and actions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
